reviewtext: After waiting close to a year for it to be made available in my area, I just got my cable modem installed today from @home.  I had already ordered the LinkSys 4 port router.I was on cloud nine when the ATT folks left after installing the basic cable modem .. replacing my old 28k dial up line, but was a little bit nervous about messing it all up with the changes I'd need to make to my wiring and settings ... anyway, I finally read the one page "Quick Install" instructions, more or less follwed them, and plugged things together (4 workstations, plus an older LinkSys hub driving an HP print server and a LapTop ethernet card) -- the ENTIRE PROCESS took 25 minutes and it works great!This is one fine product (and a great price too.)
